**Wikipedia summary**:  
The <b>trumpeter swan</b> (<i><b>Cygnus buccinator</b></i>) is a species of swan found in North America. The heaviest living bird native to North America, it is also the largest extant species of waterfowl, with a wingspan of 185 to 304.8&#160;cm (6&#160;ft 2 in to 10&#160;ft 2 in). It is the American counterpart and a close relative of the whooper swan (<i>Cygnus cygnus</i>) of Eurasia, and even has been considered the same species</p>...
